channel.title: Cheezscape help
channel.description: The tele commands dont work :mad: ive replaced them with my old one, npcs dont stop attacking um can someone tell me how to remove the npcs follow and attack? people autolog and sometimes i have to reset server justso they can get back in...[br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 10:25:59 AM[/size][hr]anyone? what i most want is magic lvls needed back to normal and npcs dont keep attacking even after they died

item.title: Cheezscape help
item.dc:creator: @hellou hellou
item.description:
@hellou wrote:

thanks i got the magic levels right but cant stop npcs attacking and following npcs

can someone make npcs stop following & attacking a player who attacks the npc? heres my npchandler

Read full topic

item.title: Cheezscape help
item.dc:creator: @cappy cappy
item.description:
@cappy wrote:

i dont exactly remember how i stoped npc’s from folowing, but it was in the npchandler.java i think. As for the magic lvls, seach for
if(magicID == 12975) // smoke barrage (lvl 86 spell)

below that you will see something like this, i already changed mine to normal

if(playerLevel[6] >= 86)
then more towards the botom of the spell, you will see

else if(playerLevel[6] <= 86)

Thats how i changed my levels required.

Read full topic
